item.title: Youth murders postgraduate student, surrenders; police book eight others
item.description:
<![CDATA[A 24-year-old postgraduate student was brutally murdered in Sindhanur of Raichur district on Thursday.
Based on a complaint by the victimâ€™s father, the police booked nine people, including the main accused, Shaikh Mubeen, who stabbed the girl to death and later surrendered before the police.
The victim identified as Shifa was a resident of Lingsugur in Raichur district. The main accused Shaikh Mubeen is also from the same place.
According to the FIR registered by the police based on the compl...]]>
